channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Gutter drain is blocked., 31st December
item.description:
The drain outside number 229 is blocked. It overflows every time it rains.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 229, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen trees blocking path and phone/power line brought to the ground, 31st December
item.description:
Bridle path through Puckham woods belonging to land owner Holly Mitchell. South of Cedar House, Woodlands farm, north west of the village of Whittington (see marker on report).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenhampton, Cotswold

item.title: Two pot hole in middle of Beeches Road., 31st December
item.description:
Two pot holes - the first outside of 1 Beeches Road and the second further up outside 5 Beeches Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Beeches Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree overhanging public footpath and private driveway by 132 Abbotswood Road,, 31st December
item.description:
Tree is willow and very brittle, with smaller limbs falling onto footpath in recent storms but whole Tree is leaning dangerously.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbotswood Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There seems to be some damage/hole next to a drainhole cover and the kerbstone has become dislodged., 31st December
item.description:
The damage is outside number 94. The kerbstone has become loose and seems to have been pushed upwards. There is a small hole in the road next to the drain/cover but I cannot see what damage is underneath and whether there is any damage to the drainage which is in very close proximity to the kerbstone/small hole. The kerbstone needs to be refixed and any damage investigated.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Laynes Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water gushing from manhole cover, 31st December
item.description:
Drain is outside The Old Bovey on Farm Lane, Shurdington. Severn Trent Water have inspected it but say it’s a blocked flood drain and not their responsibility. Water is gushing out very fast and flowing into the drain in the Main Road but that has issues of blocking so Main Road might become dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farm Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole very dangerous, 31st December
item.description:
Just outside cemetery on Kayte Lane bishops cleeve, could cause some serious damage to cars
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42,44, Kayte Lane, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: British Gas went through electric, sewer trying to put a property on to gas pipes and the streets lights haven't worked since, 31st December
item.description:
All the street lamps from number 32 Welland Drive Cheltenham GL52 3HA to the alley are out. The person living at 32 is registered blind and when she returns from club it is exceedingly difficult and frighting for her to find her gate and drive way. The lights have been out since 14 December
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pittville Circus Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: By lamppost before Millbridge Road turning, 31st December
item.description:
By lamp post before turning left into Millbridge Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Porchester Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken drain cover and hole., 31st December
item.description:
This issue has been reported and repaired however, overnight the repair has been smashed out by traffic. The hole is now worse than the original problem. The hole is down to the concrete, well over 75mm. It is causing noise, which disturbs sleep in the adjacent properties. The drain cover is loose and not fixed in place any more. The drain is still blocked (although reported). It needs immediate repair. Although I would request it is repaired properly this time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 31st December
item.description:
75mm pothole full of water
Report on FixMyStreet

Just past the churchyard

item.description:
Outside 136 Leckhampton Road near the bus stop

item.title: 2 green wheelies and rubbish, 30th December
item.description:
One green wheelie filled with garden waste has been there for several weeks, it's now been joined by another, together with some household waste. It seems the area is becoming a dumping ground. What is wrong with people?☹️
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Yeend Close, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned trolley, 30th December
item.description:
Trolley has been here for several days. I had an auto response from TBC saying that it wasn't in their area, I'm aware of that - normally FMS sends direct to CBC, so not sure why it was sent to TBC this time. Either way the trolley is still there...
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Yeend Close, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on bend - junction of Birdlip Road & Aggs Hill, 30th December
item.description:
I recently reported a number of potholes and was informed that they had been fixed (enquiry number 22034889), however the worst/deepest one has not been fixed - see photos taken earlier this pm. It is so deep it goes through a number of layers of road. Because it is situated on the bend it is not visible to traffic until the last second and looks deep enough to damage a wheel. It seems to me that it was not repaired when it should have been under enquiry 22034889?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aggs Hill, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole / sagging in pavement, 30th December
item.description:
The pothole or sagging in pavement is outside #6 Ewlyn Road. It has been there for quite some time now and fills with quite a lot of water making it a hazard for pedestrians especially in the dark evenings.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Ewlyn Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Elmstone Hardwicke, Tewkesbury

item.title: Sodden leaves badly blocking drain causing loosing and obstacle in road for pedestrians., 30th December
item.description:
Drain has been blocked with sodden leaves since autumn and is flooding road making it difficult to cross as a pedestrian.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Langdon Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
